diffeRenTES 0.2.2

    diffeRenTES_vignette

    Generates a DOT tree-like representation of the TESs

    getDifferentiationTreeAsDOTString.Rd

    getDifferentiationTreeAsDOTString returns the description of the computed TES-based differentiation tree by using the DOT Language. The returned DOT description can be passed to the saveDotFileDifferentiationTree in order to save it to a file in the local filesystem.

    Usage

    getDifferentiationTreeAsDOTString(TESs)

    Arguments

    TESs

    TES structure computed with getTESs

    Value

    A string that describe the computed TES-based differentiation tree by using the DOT Language.

    Examples

    
net <- BoolNet::generateRandomNKNetwork(10, 2)
attractors <- BoolNet::getAttractors(net) 
ATM <- getATM(net, attractors)
TESs <- getTESs(ATM) 
#> [1] "There is no threshold value equal to 0 in the ATM, I will add it for the TESs computation"
dotString <- getDifferentiationTreeAsDOTString
